attributes.action: ban the new proposed competence scheme for plumbing and electrical
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS SCHEME IS A NOTHER MONEY MAKING IDEA FOR THE GOVERMENT IT IS ALREADY COVERED IN PLUMBING BY THE INSTITUTE OF PLUMBING SINCE 1906, AND ALL ITS MEMBER HAVE TO PROVE THERE COMPETENCE THROUGH RECOGNISED QUALIFICATIONS OR EXTENSIVE EXPERIENCE,

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters. They make the text very hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
